revised_title: Dirac's New Relativistic Wave Equation and Electromagnetic Field Interaction
tldr: The authors explore Dirac's new relativistic wave equation for a spinless particle with positive energy solutions. They address the inconsistency of the equation when including electromagnetic interaction and propose a modification to the internal structure of the particle to resolve this issue. The new wave equation allows for a spinless particle to interact with the electromagnetic field without introducing inconsistencies.
